DOC.brief_title: Fat Based Enteral Nutrition Blood Glucose Control ICU
DOC.detailed_description: In randomize , double-blind clinical trial , 88 eligible hospitalize ICU patient EN include . Written consent form complete . Physical examination do specialist nutritional care process offer RD . Demographic , laboratory nutritional data extract entered prepared form . Venous blood sample take laboratory value measure record specify time . Patients divide two group . The control group standard EN ( Protein ; 20 % carbohydrate ; 50 % fat ; 30 % total calorie ) intervention group high fat EN ( Protein ; 20 % carbohydrate ; 35 % fat ; 45 % total calorie ) . 50 % total fat provide olive oil . Any feed rout naso - gastric , Percutaneous endoscopic gastrostomy ( PEG ) Percutaneous endoscopic jejunostomy ( PEJ ) Intermittent feed protocol accept feed method . Nutritional intake record form complete daily calorie intake calculate . High fat EN feeding offer 15 consecutive day maximally
